features: SENSITIVE SKIN CARE SOLUTION: ETUDE SoonJung Line is rooted in 30 years of sensitive skin research. It contains “Panthensoside”: Panthenol strengthens skin barrier and maintains moisture in the skin, Madecassoside calms down irritated skin and helps protect skin

10 INGREDIENT CALLOUTS(FRAGRANCE-FREE): Clean ingredients free of 10 additives(Free of animal-derived ingredients, mineral oil, silicone oil, polyacrylamide, imidazolidinyl urea, triethanolamine, fragrance, PEG, synthetic pigment, paraben)
CREAMY FORMULA WITH MOISTURE: Creamy moisturizing cream that rolls on smoothly and absorbs quickly, leaving the skin feeling soft and hydrated

PROVEN TEST RESULTS! HYPOALLERGENICITY TEST, DERMATOLOGICAL TEST, SENSITIVE SKIN IRRITATION TEST COMPLETED: This product did not cause hypersensitivity, tested as suitable for acne-prone skin, tested to have 0.00 skin irritation score
NON-IRRITATING, LOW pH FORMULA(WEAKLY ACIDIC): SoonJung’s formula helps women and men’s skin to maintain the correct, low pH level. Low pH products calm down and take care of your sensitive skin

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Relief Care for Irritated Skin Skin soothing Panthenol and Madecassoside are contained to calm down the irritated skin. *Limited to features of raw material Long Lasting Hydration Composed of soft, creamy formula that leaves the skin hydrated and keeps the moisture for a long time. pH Balance Care for the Best Skin Condition Formulated at an ideal pH level that is similar to the pH of healthy skin, helps the skin become balanced and healthier. Free of 10 Additives Materials derived from animals, mineral oil, color additives, synthetic perfume, polyacrylamide, silicone oil, imidazolidinylurea, triethanolamine, PEG surfactant, paraben
HOW TO USE Use at the last step of your skincare, when in need of extra moisture. Take an appropriate amount and apply on your skin, then gently pat for absorption.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Add two of these to checkout!!
reviews.reviewText: This is my holy grail. My baby-soft-skin-cream. My face gets so dry during the winter that it itches, and this stuff is an absolute godsend, keeping my skin hydrated and feeling so, so good! The best part is that you only need like a dime sized amount for it to do its thing. Honestly, give this a try, it’s ph balanced for your face, no scent, and convenient to take with you on trips or in your purse!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Moisturizer That Works Perfectly
reviews.reviewText: This is my 2nd purchase, still using the first tube but couldn’t pass on what I consider a good price. I have sensitive & problem skin & this works wonders for me. It immediately hydrates (use just a little), does not clog my pores, in fact shrinks my pores; there is no scent, I don’t have itchy skin, no break-outs, no irritation of any kind. I apply it as the last part of my facial regime first thing in the morning & just before I go to bed. I love it. I’m a senior & have a few facial moles/growths, tags, two small areas of discoloration & two surgical scars. I treat those problem areas individually with another ointment & after 45 min. apply this moisturizer. The scars have softened, not as pronounced. I see a great difference in my skin & a few friends have commented on how smooth, fresh & nice my skin looks. I am so happy to have found this healthy beauty product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Combination/DRY/acne prone AND SENSITIVE SKIN.
reviews.reviewText: If youre on an annoying search for the perfect moisturizer for your skin and are hesitant because everything disappoints, just buy this and try it.My skin checks all the boxes when it comes to pain in the butt lol and this moisturizer checks all the boxes in terms of what I was looking for in a moisturizer.Something that is light weight but very moisturizing for my extremely sensitive skin, no scent, absorbs quickly, wears well under makeup, doesn’t pill with other products including SPF, doesn’t clog my pores.I’m currently layering it with la roche posay cicaplast b5 at night because I am using tretinoin a couple times a week AND I live in Michigan and it’s cold and dry right now. I think in the summer though it will be great day and night. It miiiight be a little heavy in the day for summer with the humidity but idk we will see. I’m sure it will be fine. I just came to say that I Looooove this moisturizer and have purchased it a couple times now and will continue to purchase it. I’ve been getting the package that comes with 2 bottles. It’s a better deal. Get it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to try out the product before committing to buying the full-sized products. The foaming cleanser is great and is unscented ( great for sensitive skin! It also takes off makeup). The toner is very hydrating and lightweight. The cream triggered my fungal acne so I had a mountain range on my forehead for a little bit, but I will have to see if I just need to use less. I am used to using a lot of cream for my dry skin, so it could be a user error on my part. Overall I would buy the full-sized products when I run out of these ( except the cream)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Where have you been all my life
reviews.reviewText: As the owner of skin that is both dry + acne-prone, I require a moisturizer that does NOT…- clog my pores- require reapplication between my AM & PM routines- sting if my skin is sensitized…I’m not asking for much, right?!Well, if you’re reading this review, you probably know that basically every moisturizer has some fatal flaw — too greasy, not moisturizing enough, hydrating but not occlusive, overpoweringly scented, breakout-inducing, stingy, prohibitively expensive, texturally gross, etc.I research all skincare products via incidecoder.com to check for irritating/comedogenic/red-flag ingredients so I can decide based on the chemical info provided whether a product is even compatible with my skin type before I buy & try.Enter Soon Jung 2x Barrier Cream: I was kinda stunned when I finally stumbled on this after a ridiculous amount of trial & error.Effectively & chemically, it’s a great product, especially for those of you with dry, acne-prone, and/or sensitive skin.Not only did it pass my INCI test with flying colors, but it actually follows through on its claims in practice.Whew! It’s really no wonder so many people rave about it.Here are all the boxes it ticks, and more:- Actually non-comedogenic; very unlikely to cause breakouts- Non-irritating; doesn’t sting at all, even on accidentally-over-exfoliated skin. This is extra important for me since I’m about to start a Tretinoin + Azelaic Acid formula.- Relatively short & simple ingredient list with quite a few powerhouse “goodies”- Fragrance-free and no notable scent. If you have a very sensitive nose, you might detect a very diluted/distant “unscented lotion” smell.- Inexpensive & worth it. The tube is not huge, but knowing the other moisturizers out there, I would still buy this at double the cost.- Actually moisturizing; I only have to apply it once in my AM routine and once in the PM (taking my other hydrating & drying products into account)- It’s packaged in a hygienic tube (pots get contaminated easily from touching the contents). The tube is also kinda fun since it comes out in a lil ring!- It has a very luxurious & smooth texture; it’s easy to spread on, no pulling or pilling, even over other products (layers nicely. I rarely wear makeup so I can’t speak to how it works under foundation)- It’s breathable/not claustrophobic-feeling (maybe it’s just me who gets this from some barrier creams or thicker lotions)- Lightweight enough for daytime use if your skin is on the drier sidePic: screenshot of the INCI Decoder chart for this specific cream (note: ingredients rated on a 0-5 scale & listed together: e.g. 0 out of 5/no irritation potential, 1 out of 5/very low comedogenic potential = “0,1”).TL/DR: If you have dry skin, getting this moisturizer now will save you so much time & money, and there’s nothing to lose, as the ingredients are highly unlikely compromise your skin in any way (unless you are the victim of a very obscure allergy).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have very sensitive and oily skin, however, due to the active products I use I do experience dry patches and small breakouts in those areas. This product is so lightweight yet so moisturizing, the first time I used this product I used a pea-sized amount and that was more than enough. It goes on quite greasy, but settles into the skin nicely. For those with oily skin I would not recommend using this as an AM moisturizer as it does leave shine. But great to use before bed, I wake up and my skin still feels and looks hydrated. The bottle is way smaller than I expected, like the size of a small hand lotion tube. However, you barely need any product so I can see this lasting me a couple of months.

reviews.reviewTitle: Krem powoduje rozgrzewanie i zaczerwienienie wrażliwych części twarzy
reviews.reviewText: Krem powoduje rozgrzewanie i zaczerwienienie wrażliwych mojej części twarzy. Nie polecam. Inna osoba stwierdziła nieprzyjemne mrowienie. Na internecie również można znaleźć opinie, że u niektórych powoduje reakcje.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: makes me skin feel moisturised but not to the point of feeling greasy and looking shiny. i use this with the cosrx snail mucin and then some spf which creates the perfect base before makeup :)
Un producto 10 de 10 sin duda repetiría la compra. Me encanta la consistencia de la crema. Además es súper refrescante.

Conoscevo già questa crema,ho la pelle ipersensibile e reattiva con couperose,non tollero quasi niente ma questa crema va molto bene. Sembra leggera ma è molto molto idratante. Consigliata su pelle secca e sensibile soprattutto in inverno,in estate potrebbe essere troppo. Continuerò ad usarla finché non si alzeranno le temperature,poi probabilmente passerò alla versione più leggera sempre di Etude.
Das Beste was ich im Moment im Schränkchen habe. Gerade unter dem Makeup macht diese Pflege einen megaguten Job. Kann ich bei empfindlicher Haut nur empfehlen. Niemand wird diesen Kauf bereuen.
